alert.note: Alert for Gregg; Harrison; Marion; Panola; Rusk (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 10:13PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern De Soto and southwestern Caddo Parishes, central Marion, Harrison, Panola, northeastern Rusk and southeastern Gregg Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1013 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Waskom, or 16 miles southeast of Marshall, moving west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Shreveport, Longview, Marshall, Carthage, Hallsville, Greenwood, Blanchard, Waskom, Jefferson, Stonewall, Tatum, Oil City, Beckville, Mooringsport, Deberry, Elysian Fields, Berea, Harleton, Karnack and Woodlawn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
